short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace 'artificial intelligence' and 'AI' with 'SALAMI': Systematic Approaches to Learning Algorithms and Machine Inferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension scans webpages and replaces references to AI and "artificial intelligence" with "SALAMI." S.A.L.A.M.I. is an acronym coined by Stefano Quintarelli that stands for "Systematic Approaches to Learning Algorithms and Machine Inferences."

Read more about the term here: https://blog.quintarelli.it/2019/11/lets-forget-the-term-ai-lets-call-them-systematic-approaches-to-learning-algorithms-and-machine-inferences-salami/
